abstract: Brazilian mining company Vale, the world’s largest producer of iron ore, will invest at least $20 billion in 2011, a source close to the company said on Wednesday.
snippet: Brazilian mining company Vale, the world’s largest producer of iron ore, will invest at least $20 billion in 2011, a source close to the company said on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Vale, the Brazilian mining company that is the world’s largest producer of iron ore, will invest at least $20 billion in 2011, a source close to the company said on Wednesday, Reuters reports.

headline.main: Vale Said Set to Invest $20 Billion Next Year
